newsitem.title: GERMANY: Debis - No plans to raise Cap Gemini stake.
newsitem.headline: Debis - No plans to raise Cap Gemini stake.

text.p: Daimler-Benz InterServices AG (Debis), the services arm of Germany's Daimler-Benz group, on Thursday dismissed market speculation it plans to raise its stake in French software maker Cap Gemini.
"We have no interest at this time of raising our stake of 24.4 percent in Cap Gemini," Debis spokesman Rainer Knubben told Reuters.
He added that this would not be allowed because it would violate the bank holding company law of the United States.
Traders have speculated that Daimler could carry out a capital increase without the participation of Deutsche Bank and thereby get around the U.S. law.
But when asked about this, Knubben just repeated his statement that Debis had no current plans to raise its stake in Cap Gemini.
